item.title: dedeh add a quote by Gol A Gong pendiri omunitas Rumah Dunia Serang Banten
item.description: "Menjadi berguna jauh lebih pnting daripada sekedar menjadi orang penting." (Gol A Gong, pendiri omunitas Rumah Dunia, Serang Banten)" -- Gol A Gong pendiri omunitas Rumah Dunia Serang Banten

item.title: dedeh add a quote by Jodi Picoult
item.description: "Jika kau memilih untuk mencari sesuatu, maka sebaiknya kau siap menghadapi apa pun yang kau temukan. Karena mungkin itu bukan seperti yang kau harapkan." -- Jodi Picoult

item.title: dedeh add a quote by Sapardi Djoko Damono
dedeh add a quote by Millie
item.description: "By chance we met, by choice we become friend" -- Millie

item.title: dedeh add a quote by Mother Teresa
item.description: "If you judge people, you have no time to love them." -- Mother Teresa

item.title: dedeh add a quote by Mother Teresa
item.description: "Do not think that love in order to be genuine has to be extraordinary. What we need is to love without getting tired. Be faithful in small things because it is in them that your strength lies." -- Mother Teresa

item.title: dedeh add a quote by Thomas A. Edison
item.description: "I have not failed. I've just found 10,000 ways that won't work." -- Thomas A. Edison

item.title: dedeh add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: dedeh add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Be the change that you wish to see in the world." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: dedeh add a quote by Narcotics Anonymous
item.description: "Insanity is doing the same thing, over and over again, but expecting different results." -- Narcotics Anonymous

item.title: dedeh add a quote by Gordon A. Eadie
item.description: "If you don't stand for something you will fall for anything." -- Gordon A. Eadie

item.title: dedeh add a quote by Helen Keller
item.description: "The highest result of education is tolerance" -- Helen Keller

item.title: dedeh add a quote by Walt Disney
item.description: "I would rather entertain and hope that people learned something than educate people and hope they were entertained" -- Walt Disney

item.title: dedeh add a quote by Karen Andreola
item.description: "[A woman's] education should be as varied and perfect as possible. If for no other reason to enable her properly to educate and rear her own children. Whatever grand truths are planted in the mother's mind may take root in the next generation, and there grow, blossom, and shed their perfume on the world. The child receives the mother's very thought by intuition. If the mother's mind is weak and narrow in its range, the child is affected by this fact long before it finds meaning in the mother's words. But if the mother's mind is cultured and refined by study until her thoughts are grand and far-reaching, the child's soul will grow and expand under the mesmeric influence of these thoughts, as the plant grows under the influence of the sun." -- Karen Andreola

item.title: dedeh add a quote by George Washington
item.description: "My mother was the most beautiful woman I ever saw. All I am I owe to my mother. I attribute my success in life to the moral, intellectual and physical education I received from her." -- George Washington

item.title: dedeh add a quote by Sapardi Djoko Damono
dedeh add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "If you tell the truth, you don't have to remember anything." -- Mark Twain

item.title: dedeh add a quote by Sapardi Djoko Damono
item.description: "Apa yang kau tangkap dari suara hujan Dari daun-daun bugenvil yang teratur mengetuk jendel. Apakah yang kau tangkap dari bau tanah Dari ricik air yang turun di selokan" -- Sapardi Djoko Damono

item.title: dedeh add a quote by Sapardi Djoko Damono
item.description:
"The day will come When my body no longer exists But in the lines of this poem I will never let you be alone
The day will come When my voice is no longer heard But within the words of this poem I will continue to watch over you
The day will come When my dreams are no longer known But in the spaces found in the letters of this poem I will never tired of looking for you" -- Sapardi Djoko Damono

item.title: dedeh add a quote by Millie
item.description: "Blind is not the situation when people cannot see others but when people fail to feel or sense the existence of others" -- Millie

item.title: dedeh add a quote by Leo Tolstoy
item.description: "Tuhan tahu, tapi menunggu ..... " -- Leo Tolstoy

item.title: dedeh add a quote by Mae West
item.description: "You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough." -- Mae West

item.title: dedeh add a quote by H. Jackson Brown Jr.
item.description: "Twenty years from now you will be more disappointed by the things that you didn't do than by the ones you did do. So throw off the bowlines. Sail away from the safe harbor. Catch the trade winds in your sails. Explore. Dream. Discover." -- H. Jackson Brown Jr.

item.title: dedeh add a quote by Charles Baudelaire
item.description: "Always be a poet, even in prose." -- Charles Baudelaire

item.title: dedeh add a quote by Jim Rohn
item.description: "Formal education will make you a living; self-education will make you a fortune." -- Jim Rohn

item.title: dedeh add a quote by Nelson Mandela
item.description: "Education is the most powerful weapon which you can use to change the world." -- Nelson Mandela

item.title: dedeh add a quote by Leo Babauta
item.description: "At the end of the day, the questions we ask of ourselves determine the type of people that we will become." -- Leo Babauta

item.title: dedeh add a quote by John Lennon
item.description: "Count your age by friends, not years. Count your life by smiles, not tears." -- John Lennon

item.title: dedeh add a quote by George R.R. Martin
item.description: "A mind needs books as a sword needs a whetstone, if it is to keep its edge." -- George R.R. Martin

item.title: dedeh add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Logic will get you from A to Z; imagination will get you everywhere." -- Albert Einstein
